FBS_ENSWITCH2 (ENUM)
FBS_ENSWITCH2 (ENUM)
Â¶
TYPE FBS_ENSWITCH2 :
Definition of SF_EnableSwitch_2 function block states and its diagnostic values.
Attributes:
qualified_only
InOut:
Name
Initial
Comment
IDLE
16#0
The function block is not active (initial state).
BASIC_OPMODE
16#8002
Safe operation mode is not active.
SAFE_OPMODE
16#8004
Safe operation mode is active.
NOT_ENABLED
16#8802
Safe operation mode is active and the enable switch is in
position 1 or 3.
ENABLED
16#8000
Safe operation mode is active and the enable switch is in
position 2.
ERR_OPERATION
16#C010
Enable switch not in position 1 during activation of
S_SafetyActive. S_EnableIn = TRUE
ERR_OPERATION_RESREQ
16#C410
Enable switch not in position 1 during activation of
S_SafetyActive. S_EnableIn = FALSE
ERR_RESET_1
16#C001
Static Reset signal detected in state Cx10.

rows.Name: IDLE
rows.Comment: The function block is not active (initial state).

rows.Name: BASIC_OPMODE
rows.Comment: Safe operation mode is not active.

rows.Name: NOT_ENABLED
rows.Comment:
Safe operation mode is active and the enable switch is in
position 1 or 3.

rows.Name: ENABLED
rows.Comment:
Safe operation mode is active and the enable switch is in
position 2.

rows.Name: ERR_OPERATION
rows.Comment:
Enable switch not in position 1 during activation of
S_SafetyActive. S_EnableIn = TRUE

rows.Name: ERR_OPERATION_RESREQ
rows.Comment:
Enable switch not in position 1 during activation of
S_SafetyActive. S_EnableIn = FALSE

rows.Name: ERR_RESET_1
rows.Comment: Static Reset signal detected in state Cx10.
